# Comment line - should be ignored
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIGsqP5+FFpB4sP0JaZ3EZVrFqXpQR8HfnLWLbYZlM2RV user@workstation

# Key with from= restriction - good practice
from="10.0.0.0/8" ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIBZUi1E6jjN4EsZoYKHM0a1cP3VnXqv6xZ5KZHYzBq7C admin@secure-host

# RSA 4096 bit key - strong
ssh-rsa  strong-key@server
